item.title: Quality Assurance Testers needed for music / video content (palo alto)
item.description:
mSpot is a start-up company bringing music and movie entertainment to mobile phones. We are hiring Quality Assurance Testers to assist with testing our music playlists, testing video and audio content, and database management.


mSpot partners with major film studios and music labels to deliver blockbuster films, music videos, and television programming. mSpot has plans to introduce additional mobile entertainment services in the coming months, including customized entertainment channels, premium video programming and mobile-exclusive original programming.


Job Duties:
-Test music playlists for accuracy and quality
-Track daily progress
-Test movies for quality
-Log all errors in database
-Light testing of Mobile applications


Qualifications:
-Experience with Excel
-Strong attention to detail
-Must be thorough, and timely in your testing
-Must be a self starter


For more information please visit our website at www.mspot.com.
Please send resumes to: testing@mspot.com
item.dc:title: Quality Assurance Testers needed for music / video content (palo alto)
